Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are casually strolling down Avatar Boulevard, taking in the sights.
Room.LongDescription: There are many sights to look at as you walk along Avatar Boulevard. Quite obviously, on the west, you can see the majestic Lyanden Lake and the Lyanden Castle. To the east, you can see the mysterious Avatar Ruins, where the gods once fought over control of the land and its people.
